Package org.gbif.ws.server.provider

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerExceptionMapper
    Mapper to handle ContainerException which wrap exceptions thrown from injectable providers.
    CountryProvider
    Jersey provider class that extracts the requested country enum out of request parameters.
    DatasetSearchRequestProvider  
    DatasetSuggestRequestProvider  
    FacetedSearchRequestProvider<RT extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter>
    Provider class that transforms a set of HTTP parameters into a FacetedSearchRequest class instance.
    IllegalArgumentExceptionMapper
    Converts a IllegalArgumentException into a http 400 bad request.
    JsonMappingExceptionMapper
    Converts a JsonMappingException into a http 400 bad request.
    LocaleProvider
    Jersey provider class that extracts the requested locale based on http header or language query parameter.
    NameUsageSearchRequestProvider  
    NameUsageSuggestRequestProvider  
    OccurrenceSearchRequestProvider  
    PageableProvider
    Jersey provider class that extracts the page size and offset from the query parameters, or provides the default implementation if necessary.
    SearchRequestProvider<RT extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchRequest<P>,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter>
    Provider class that transforms a set of HTTP parameters into a SearchRequest class instance.
    UnsupportedOperationExceptionMapper
    Converts a UnsupportedOperationException into a http 501 not implemented.
    ValidationExceptionMapper
    Converts a ConstraintViolationException into a http 422 bad request and gives a meaningful messages on the issues.
